channel.title: 7-Day Retention on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in 7-Day Retention on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Soft Delete feature in Azure Compute Gallery
item.description:
Azure Compute Gallery now has a Public Preview of a Soft Delete feature that lets you recover accidentally deleted images within a 7-day retention period.

  • Source: Azure Updates
